entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
